## Source: ossf-package-analysis (2247aa862abe98b3100806d69d7da35feb63df073c9da6680b4265c7f055bbd4)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'corehome' @ 7.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
